Description: Enter-AzVM Does not support ShouldProcess but the cmdlet verb Enter indicates that it should.
Remediation: Determine if the cmdlet should implement ShouldProcess and if so determine if it should implement Force / ShouldContinue

Description: Export-AzSshConfig Does not support ShouldProcess but the cmdlet verb Export indicates that it should.
Remediation: Determine if the cmdlet should implement ShouldProcess and if so determine if it should implement Force / ShouldContinue
